main.name: Oscar Barba
main.bio: I have a great passion for technology that was born thanks to video games that I still enjoy. I like to build things, especially DIY projects. There's nothing better than breathing fresh air on top of a mountain, which is why I love hiking, biking, running, and exercising outdoors. I also enjoy coding as a hobby and participating in hackathons
main.description: I consider myself an experienced, self-motivated, result-driven, flexible professional with a passion for programming who specializes in turning business ideas into software solutions, I have over 10 years of experience as a Software Engineer.  I've been through different industries such as healthcare, sales, journalism, tax and assurance, travel, hospitality, finances, social media, among others. All that gives me a critical eye and a wider view to think outside the box.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Software Engineer

resume.skillmessage: Using .NET technologies my whole career but added a few more skills that started out of curiosity or from hobby projects. Always looking to learn interesting technologies to build better and up-to-date solutions

testimonials.textES: Compromiso, experiencia y dedicacion es como describiria a Oscar Barba, un profesional que no solo ayuda a alcanzar las metas trazadas, si no tambien colabora a tener un gran ambiente de trabajo
testimonials.textEN: Commitment, experience and dedication is how I would describe Oscar Barba, a professional who not only helps to achieve the goals set, but also helps to have a great work environment
